::: {.intro-box}
## üìò Introduction

In this course, we will learn how to solve complex decision-making problems using mathematical optimization techniques. We will explore linear programming, transportation and assignment models, queuing systems, scheduling algorithms, and game theory to make better decisions in real-world scenarios.
:::
